ProductName: Blink Mini 2 [Newest Model] - Home Security & Pet Camera(s) with HD video, color night view, motion detection, two-way audio, and built-in spotlight - 1 camera (Black)
Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2024
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Comment: This camera is very easy to install...just plug it in!  The phone app recognized it immediately and it works perfectly.  This is a good upgrade from the Mini original that has also been working flawlessly for several years.  Better picture, small spotlight, and the black color is easier to hide from my dog Roscoe!  In fact, I call it my "Roscoe cam" as I use it to monitor him when I'm away.  The motion sensing function is excellent, and the camera comes up in the app quickly.  I had to turn off the notification option, as Roscoe was triggering the camera and sending a notification to my phone every few minutes when home alone.  Easy to do in the app.  Really good quality device, especially considering it doesn't break the bank!!

ProductName: Blink Mini 2 [Newest Model] - Home Security & Pet Camera(s) with HD video, color night view, motion detection, two-way audio, and built-in spotlight - 1 camera (Black)

We have had them for almost a week now and have had no problems. No lost wifi  connection, motion detection alerts and pictures and live view are great. We are very happy with Blink and plan to purchase some additional devices.installation was very easy!

ProductName: Blink Mini 2 [Newest Model] - Home Security & Pet Camera(s) with HD video, color night view, motion detection, two-way audio, and built-in spotlight - 1 camera (Black)

They did not disappoint. ProductName: Blink Mini 2 [Newest Model] - Home Security & Pet Camera(s) with HD video, color night view, motion detection, two-way audio, and built-in spotlight - 1 camera (Black)
Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2024
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Comment: I've been using blink system sir a while. Over all good. Clear pictures. Night vision. The outdoor ones also include a bright light of needed or set with "motion". Timer options. Good feature. Sounds is good a bit low and some lag on the talking feature but decent. Can live view. Have multiple cameras in a group. Only cons are , they go "offline" randomly and nothing can do ton reset remotely. Have to come home, unplug n plug. Not very useful if away from home/ vacation. Also can not continuously live view. I believe it's 3 or 5 min intervals then have to go back in to the camera. For the price and what it can do, it's worth it. I have 6.

ProductName: Blink Mini 2 [Newest Model] - Home Security & Pet Camera(s) with HD video, color night view, motion detection, two-way audio, and built-in spotlight - 1 camera (Black)
Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2024
Comment: Had nothing but trouble with my Ring outdoor floodlight camera.  So during Prime days...I jumped on the Blink bandwagon and boy and I glad I did.  I haven't had a single issue to date.  I've even ordered more cameras.  They're fantastic!  The resolution is great and the options you have in the setup is great.  You can turn the LED indicators off so it's not obvious the camera is on, you can turn the sound off, and a whole lot more.  They work great in the dark too!  I've got one indoor cam, a doorbell camera, the wired floodlight camera, and two outdoor cameras.  And the app is great too!

Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars

ProductName: Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm Lens | Built-in Wi-Fi | 24.1 MP CMOS Sensor | DIGIC 4+ Image Processor and Full HD Videos
Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2024
Comment: A good basic DSLR camera, no argument. The kit gives you two lenses to use according to what you intend to shoot, at a price much less than if you were to buy those lenses separately. HOWEVER, once your pictures have been taken, the ability to transfer them to another device (smartphone or computer) is done wirelessly using wifi, and that is where the problem lies. I could never establish a consistent connection between the camera and my phone -- the software might work one time but not the next. Would have much preferred if there had been provided the appropriate cable for making such transfers. I've wasted so much time trying to get help from Youtube videos, without success, so I'm throwing in the towel and returning everything. Do yourself a favor and avoid the aggravation by choosing another option. /// UPDATE: Rather than return this camera I decided I would give the folks at Canon an opportunity to help (don't forget the Youtube videos necessarily, but maybe they weren't my best first choice). I was very pleasantly surprised by how well the support group at Canon helped me to understand how their camera-to-phone connection worked. First, there were NO long wait times to reach someone to talk to, both chat and phone personnel (LIVE, not bots, at least it seemed). They were friendly, patient, and caring. And knowledgeable! I am now able to easily transfer photos from my camera to my phone without any glitches. I did learn, however, that transferring videos is best done to a computer, as a computer will recognize Canon's video format while a phone may not. For that you'll need a mini USB cable (I advised Canon that it would be a sensible item to include with the camera kit, but it is conveniently available on Amazon). I can now confidently give this Canon camera kit a 4-star rating because I'm still getting familiar with its various modes of operation, otherwise I might have gone higher.

ProductName: Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm Lens | Built-in Wi-Fi | 24.1 MP CMOS Sensor | DIGIC 4+ Image Processor and Full HD Videos
Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2024
Title: Worth it

Though it does work I feel like I could have done better in that aspect. Now in every other way this thing is great. If youâ€™re looking for an every day camera to just document or practice pretty much anything else but going into portraits for a profession, I really think this thing would be the one for you!

ProductName: Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm Lens | Built-in Wi-Fi | 24.1 MP CMOS Sensor | DIGIC 4+ Image Processor and Full HD Videos
Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2024
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Comment: I'd like to recommend this entry-level DSLR camera to all users who haven't bought a camera yet. I initially came across it during a digital photography class where it was provided, and subsequently, I purchased it myself! It's incredibly easy to operate and handle, and now I use it as my primary tool for commercial photography. The results are exceptionally clear in well-lit areas. There can be some difficulties when shooting at night without flash, but the photos still turn out great after post-processing! The following photo was taken using the M mode, and it offers a great user experience.The battery life is also impressive. When I'm just taking photos and not recording videos, I can shoot for three to four hours straight without the battery level dropping significantly. However, video recording consumes more battery. Additionally, this camera is highly versatile, producing excellent results in portrait and landscape photography, and is also ideal for street photography.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on February 2, 2024
Title: Canon
Comment: The Canon Rebel T7 camera offers a compelling entry-level experience for photography enthusiasts. Its 24.1-megapixel APS-C CMOS sensor delivers crisp and vibrant images, while the DIGIC 4+ image processor ensures swift performance.The camera's autofocus system performs admirably, especially in well-lit conditions, providing quick and accurate focus on subjects. Its beginner-friendly features, such as Scene Intelligent Auto mode, make it accessible for those new to DSLR photography.The T7's ergonomic design and lightweight build enhance portability without compromising on durability. The 3-inch LCD screen is clear and bright, facilitating easy composition and review of shots.While the camera lacks advanced features like 4K video recording, its Full HD video capabilities produce decent results. Battery life is commendable, allowing for extended shooting sessions without constant recharging.In conclusion, the Canon Rebel T7 is an excellent choice for entry-level photographers seeking a reliable and user-friendly DSLR camera with solid image quality and performance.

Comment: I recently purchased the Gavonde Digital Camera as a gift for a friend. The camera looks identical to otherâ€™s reviews and the pictures online. This picture attached is a test shot I took to make sure that the camera was working.I think the best thing about this camera is that it is very straightforward and easy to use, with buttons and features that are self explanatory. I also like that the display can be flipped around for an easy selfie mode. Another feature I liked is that you can adjust the image quality on the camera itself, you can increase the pixels for a better picture or decrease it if you want. For the price, I really canâ€™t complain. It doesnâ€™t have the same advanced features as more premium cameras, but itâ€™s great for anyone just getting into photography or looking for a backup camera.Overall, Iâ€™m very impressed with its performance, especially for the price. It offers a lot of features typically found in more expensive cameras, making it an excellent value for beginners or casual photographers. Highly recommended if you're on a budget but still want something reliable!

ProductName: Digital Camera for Photography, 4K Vlogging Camera for YouTube 3 180Â° Flip Screen 18X Digital Zoom Compact Retro Camera with 32GB TF Card & 2 Batteries, Black
Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2024
Title: Great Novice Vlogging Camera!
Comment: This camera is an amazingly great purchase. I needed a second camera for my YouTube videos and didn't want to spend a fortune. I just needed something affordable with good quality. The reviews on this camera were good so I gave it a shot. My expectations were vastly exceeded with the quality of the picture and the ease of use. The settings are easy to change and manage and it fits on any standard tripod. The flip-up screen is one of the best features when needing to see yourself in the camera frame. It comes with two batteries that last about 2 hours each and a 32GB SD card which will hold about 1.5 hrs of 4K footage. If you're looking for something affordable that also provides amazing quality video, order this right now. Couldn't be happier with this camera.

ProductName: Digital Camera for Photography, 4K Vlogging Camera for YouTube 3 180Â° Flip Screen 18X Digital Zoom Compact Retro Camera with 32GB TF Card & 2 Batteries, Black
Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2024
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Comment: Super cute and handy camera, I love the filters on it and the sound quality is pretty good for videos. The camera quality is about the same as my phone but with much better lighting, so it's not suuuper HQ but if you've been using a supbar phone to take pictures like I have for the past few years, this is definitely an upgrade. So my advice is, if quality is super important to you than I would look for another camera since this one is average. However, it is aesthetically pleasing and definitely gives off home video vibes. Only downsides are, 1. that the focusing is a little tricky to get a hang of, and if you get close to the camera it goes out of focus. 2., for selfie mode, you can't rotate the screen that's flipped it just stays in place, and 3., the camera falls forward when trying to balance it on a surface. You definitely need a tripod or something of the sort to keep the camera propped up. For the price it seems like a well made camera so far that won't break, and a very good replacement for my phone's limited storage.I will say, with this camera I literally took the best selfie ever! Very flattering, much more than my phone's lens

The camera integrates seamlessly with Alexa, making it easy to check the live feed or get motion alerts through voice commands.Setting up motion detection zones was straightforward with the app, ensuring I only receive notifications for activity where I need it. ProductName: Ring Floodlight Cam Wired Plus with motion-activated 1080p HD video, White (2021 release)
Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2024
Title: Reliable, high-quality security solution
Comment: The Ring Wired Floodlight Cam has exceeded my expectations in every way! Setting it up was straightforward with clear instructions, and once installed, it instantly became a huge upgrade to my home security. The video quality is incredibly sharp, even at night, and I love that I can see and hear everything happening around my property. The 1080p HD camera captures clear footage during both day and night, and the night vision mode works surprisingly well.The two-way audio is a fantastic feature; it allows me to communicate with anyone at my door or on my property directly through my phone, which is great for deliveries or unexpected visitors. The motion detection is highly customizable, and I appreciate being able to adjust the sensitivity to avoid unnecessary alerts for small animals or passing cars. I especially love that itâ€™s hardwired, so thereâ€™s no need to worry about charging batteriesâ€”just constant, reliable power.The floodlights are impressively bright and light up a wide area, deterring any potential intruders and giving me peace of mind when I come home after dark. I also like that they automatically turn on when motion is detected, which is both energy-efficient and convenient. With the Ring app, I can control the lights, check live footage, and review recorded clips anytime, which is perfect for keeping an eye on my home when Iâ€™m away.Overall, the Ring Wired Floodlight Cam has given me a great sense of security and added so much value to my home. Itâ€™s an investment, but well worth it for the peace of mind and safety it provides. Highly recommend for anyone looking to upgrade their home security with an effective, high-quality system!

ProductName: Ring Floodlight Cam Wired Plus with motion-activated 1080p HD video, White (2021 release)

Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Comment: The Ring Floodlight Cam Wired Plus bundle with the Echo Show 5 is an exceptional addition to any home security setup! The Floodlight Cam provides bright, adjustable lighting and a crystal-clear view, allowing me to monitor my property day and night. The two-way audio feature is a great touch, letting me communicate with anyone outside from anywhere in my home.Pairing it with the Echo Show 5 enhances the experience, allowing me to view live feeds, get notifications, and even control other smart devices with ease. The integration is seamless, making home security both convenient and effective. Highly recommend this bundle for anyone looking to boost their home safety!
